content: Overview of Lamborghini translations process and globalization: localization strategy, teams, TMS, MT, TM, API, CMS Integration, security, standards and guidelines, I18N tools, methods, models, workflows, TMS customization, technics, Reporting and analytics, vendors, reviews/LQA, Scalability, user friendliness, cost, user/license limits, collaboration, support, supported content types, roles and permissions.
